value.title: Create an environment for Power BI to run your Python scripts
value.excerpt: In today's video I will show you how you create an environment to run python scripts for Power BI.   If you haven't work with Python before, I recommend you to check this two videos first: Install python and more: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M2kZe9Pi6xg Guide to python and R: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BI8FcI_sgR0

Experiment with different colors by importing palettes from your favourite

value.title: DAX Fridays! #14: SUMMARIZE
value.excerpt: Learn how to use the function SUMMARIZE in DAX/ Powerpivot.  The function SUMMARIZE can return a summary of sales grouped around the calendar year and the product category name, this result table allows you to do analysis over the reseller sales by year and product category.  Source:https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/gg492171.aspx

value.title: DAX FRIDAYS! #178 : My age calculations in DAX and Power Query are wrong!! How do I do it?
value.excerpt: Calculating age is harder that you think, both in power query and dax.  In today's video, I am going to show you two ways to do it with DAX  and power query that get the closest to the actual age.  Do you know any other method to calculate age? Share it in the comments!
